(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (ADJP (JJ funny))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB why))
        (S
          (NP (EX there))
          (VP (VBP are) (RB not)
            (ADVP (RBR more))
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Satay) (NNP Bee) (NNP Hoon) (NNP Stalls))
              (PP (IN around)
                (NP (NNP Singapore))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(funny-3, It-1)
cop(funny-3, 's-2)
root(ROOT-0, funny-3)
advmod(are-6, why-4)
expl(are-6, there-5)
advcl(funny-3, are-6)
neg(are-6, not-7)
advmod(are-6, more-8)
nn(Stalls-12, Satay-9)
nn(Stalls-12, Bee-10)
nn(Stalls-12, Hoon-11)
nsubj(are-6, Stalls-12)
prep(Stalls-12, around-13)
pobj(around-13, Singapore-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN demand))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (DT this) (JJ famous) (NNP Satay) (NNP Bee) (NNP Hoon))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ great)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (CD 10.30)))
            (VP (VBP pm)
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP (NN night)))))))
      (, ,))))

nn(Hoon-8, Bee-7)

pobj(at-13, 10.30-14)

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT the) (NN stall))

        (VP
          (VP (VBN changed)
            (NP (NNS hands))

              (S
